subject: Re: [junit] specify testing order using user-desired way?
msgSnippet: The idea of specifying test order was discussed in https://groups.yahoo.com/neo/groups/junit/conversations/topics/24443 but I don t think anyone took it on.
messageBody:
The idea of specifying test order was discussed in https://groups.yahoo.com/neo/groups/junit/conversations/topics/24443 but I don't think anyone took it on. Feel free to send a pull request or to bounce around API ideas.

I for one would love to see documentation in multiple languages. How can we help you get this started?
